original_text: You already have everything that you need, do you? You think that you are very rich already! You are ready to rule as kings. You no longer need us to help you. I think it would be good if you had really become kings. Then we could also rule together with you!
korean_text: 너희가 이미 배 부르며 이미 풍성하며 우리 없이도 왕이 되었도다 우리가 너희와 함께 왕 노릇 하기 위하여 참으로 너희가 왕이 되기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: You already have everything that you need
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이미 필요한 모든 것을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: You think that you are very rich already!
You are ready to rule as kings.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 왕으로 통치할 준비가 되어 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: You no longer need us to help you.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 더 이상 우리의 도움이 필요하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: I think it would be good
if you had really become kings.
Then we could also rule together with you!
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리도 당신과 함께 통치할 수 있을 것입니다!
